module.name: design_specific_assignment_to_interconnect_usage_view
module.keywords: module, component feature, part feature, component terminal, swap, interconnect usage view, interconnect

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the assignment of component terminals in a interconnect design view to part terminals in the interconnect usage view.

inscope.li: assignment of component terminals in an interconnect design to part features in the usage view of the interconnect;
items within the scope of Fabrication_joint_arm;
items within the scope of Interconnect_module_usage_view_arm;
items within the scope of Land_arm;

outscope.li: assignment of features that are not terminals
